en.title: [4Q 2024] Balance of Payments
en.description: Quarterly balance of payments, covering the current account, capital account, and financial account.
en.description_email: DOSM has just released the latest quarterly balance of payments data, covering the current account (CA), capital account (KA), and financial account (FA). The CA balance rose to RM11.4 bil (3Q 2024: RM2.2 bil), while the KA and FA recorded lower net outflows of RM5.8 bil (3Q 2024: RM7.5 bil). Consequently, reserve assets fell by RM6.1 bil during the quarter.

bm.title: [ST4 2024] Imbangan Pembayaran
bm.description: Imbangan pembayaran suku tahunan, merangkumi akaun semasa, akaun modal, dan akaun kewangan.
bm.description_email: DOSM telah menerbitkan data imbangan pembayaran suku tahunan terkini, merangkumi akaun semasa (CA), akaun modal (KA), dan akaun kewangan (FA). Baki CA meningkat kepada RM11.4 bil (ST3 2024: RM2.2 bil), manakala KA dan FA mencatatkan aliran keluar bersih yang lebih rendah sebanyak RM5.8 bil (ST3 2024: RM7.5 bil). Aset rizab menurun sebanyak RM6.1 bil pada suku tahun keempat.
